turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there, I want to place a Starbucks order. Help me out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Which Starbucks location is this for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This will be for the Starbucks in North Park in San Diego, CA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanna get the seasonal Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande size. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2% milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Would you like to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea I'll add whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I'd like a grande cappuccino as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2% milk with that as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Gotcha. Anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. You order will be ready shortly at the North Park San Diego, CA Starbucks location. Your receipt will be texted to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Have a great day!
